title: Global Partners Announce a New Effort - "The Big Catch-up" - to Vaccinate Millions of Children and Restore Immunization Progress Lost During the Pandemic
description: 'The Big Catch-up' is an extended effort to lift vaccination levels among children to at least pre-pandemic levels and aims to ensure stronger primary health care services for essential immunization in the future.
